skillTree.localised_description: The largest and most terrifiying specimen that could be found.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Norscan vampires are a unique stock. Boasting god blessed powers before they were given the kiss led to a new and more bestial breed of vampire.

effects.description:
Unit Passive: "Murderous Charge" (Agents Army)
	(all units in army)

Ward save: 1% for Flesh Walker Mongrol And Doom Wolf Knight Units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
This one will not go down easily  it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.
Never to be broken or dishonoured  never to succumb to the foe.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform
Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocated Oath"

ui_effects.localised_text: Greatly replenishes hit points of combatants

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Chillwind Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, its not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Using a combination of their great strength and amazing speed, its easy for a Vampire to create a gap in their opponents guard.

skillTree.localised_name: Woe To All But The Worthy!
skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions regret their rash pride after the valiant challenge they issued is accepted by a creature whose eyes are the eyes of death itself.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: A true knight will never abandon his armour; sometimes the steel skin appears to be part of his body.
The first master of the Blood Dragons still walks among their ranks, and sees all that is done in his name.
Direwolves make useful tools when chasing down even the quickest of prey.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
